response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations and enhance your market position. Given its value to you, I estimate it to be worth $1,200,000. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate with you on this exciting venture.", "product_price": 1150000}
